lead_paragraph: At least eight Indian soldiers were fatally shot by separatist militants in the India’s northeastern state of Nagaland.

headline.print_headline: Militants Kill Eight Soldiers in North India
headline.main: Indian Soldiers Killed in Militant Ambush in Nagaland

snippet: At least eight Indian soldiers were fatally shot by separatist militants in the India’s northeastern state of Nagaland.
abstract: At least eight Indian soldiers are killed by separatist militants in northeastern province of Nagaland, India.
